attributes.action: GIVE CARERS ALLOWANCE ALONG WITH STATE PENSION YO OVER 60 YEAR OLD CARERS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
When you reach 60 and draw your pension you cannot claim a carers allowance even if you will care long before and after this age. Many parent carers care for disabled off-spring until death with out any financial recognition after 60. This is an appalling state of affairs in a so called prosperous and civilized society.
CARERS ALLOWANCE  ON TOP OF PENSION AFTER 60
